lace.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a fine cloth made with patterns of many very small holes
lace.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a string that is pulled through special holes in shoes or clothing to pull the edges together and fasten them
lace.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to fasten something by tying a lace
lace.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Lace up your shoes or youâ€™ll trip over.

lace.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to add a small amount of alcohol or a drug to a drink
lace.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: to weave or twist several things together
